Review Title: Dinner in Ho Chi Minh City.
Review Text:
Was a beautiful atmosphere. The staff can't do enough for you. Overall a really neet experience. 
BTW... the Crayfish Mornay was fat plump and perfectly cooked !

Thank you guys! 😚

Review Title: The best place in town for Saigon river view
Review Text: Elisa Floating Restaurant offers impeccable service paired with a breathtaking view. The attentive staff and the mesmerizing scenery combine to create an unforgettable dining experience.

Awesome venue for a meal sat on the outside deck admiring the stunning river view at night, food was lovely amazing choices great flavours, we were well looked after by the staff thank you to Phuc for looking after us, great memories

Review Title: Anniversary dinner last night in Vietnam
Review Text:
The best meal in Saigon 
Was far above expectations 
Food was superior 
Staff treated us with respect and kindness despite the language barrier.

Review Title: A nice end to a busy day.
Review Text: We were lucky enough to be seated at an outside table with a view of the harbor and the ships passing by.  Although it had been a hot day the sun was down and there was a nice breeze.  We were with another couple and got two bottles of wine, small but adequate selection and prices were good (we are from the US so the exchange rate helped some).  The food was very good and the service was excellent.
Nơi tuyệt nhất để ngắm vẻ đẹp sông Sài Gòn, món ăn ổn, phục vụ chuyên nghiệp. Hứa hẹn quay trở lại vì đây là vị trí tuyệt vời để xem pháo hoa các ngày lễ lớn!
I had a great time dining here. From service, food to the view, everything is good, well worth the experience compared to the price.
Amazing food, service and atmosphere. Highly recommended! The view was incredible! Be sure to getvthe Lotus flower salad.

Review Title: Sinh nhật ms Quỳnh tại elisa
Review Text: Đồ ăn ngon, trang trí đẹp mắt, không gian lãng mạn, nhân viên thân thiện, ban nhạc hay, phù hợp với không gian. View sống thoáng mát

Review Title: beautiful setting for a great meal
Review Text: Beautiful setting for a great meal in HCMC, located right on the river. Staff were very friendly and helpful with meal choices. Food was so well presented, and tasted really good. We had the crab spring rolls for starters…so good! Then pan seared cod and beef in peppered sauce, both really good. We ended with coconut ice cream, served in half a coconut…a great way to end a beautiful evening. We’d recommend a visit to Elisa
